verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Verse:
With my whole heart i have sought You
With my whole heart
With my whole heart i have sought You
With my whole heart

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Chorus:
Let me not wander from Your commandments
Let me not wander from Your word
For Your word I've hidden in my heart
That I might not sin against You

verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
Bridge:
Blessed are You Lord in all of Your ways
I open up my mouth, declare Your praise
I will meditate on Your word and I will not forget
I will not forget Your promises to me
